constraints.name: grid_value_uniformity
constraints.description: 所有网格单元的值必须同时等于给定的目标值 V

constraints.name: operation_validity
constraints.description: 操作只能在两个对角邻居都在网格内时进行
constraints.formal: if (i, j) is chosen, then (i-1, j+1) and (i+1, j-1) must be within the grid bounds

constraints.name: value_modification_rule
constraints.description: 每次操作选择一个网格单元，将其值减 1，并将其两个对角邻居的值各加 1
constraints.formal: if (i, j) is chosen, then grid[i][j] -= 1, grid[i-1][j+1] += 1, grid[i+1][j-1] += 1
